strIntroduction:
Enjoy the beauty of Arashiyama!
It's a popular 3 in 1 tour of Arashiyama. Sagano Scenic Railway (嵯峨野観光鉄道) also known as Sagano Romantic Train or Sagano Torokko, which is a sightseeing railway running along the Hozugawa River between Arashiyama and Kameoka. Taking on the old fashioned scenic train, you can enjoy the beautiful scenery of Arashiyama. Once you reach Torokko Kameoka Station, the terminal station of the line, you will participate in Hozugawa River Cruise. Once on the boat, you will enjoy a 16 kilometer, two hours exciting journey with rapids.
strTitle: 《Arashiyama one day tour 》Sagano Torokko＋Shuttle Bus＋Hozugawa River Cruise

strIntroduction: Transform into seabirds! Adore the beautiful Okinawa from 40~50m above the sky with its stunning sapphire ocean view! This package is suitable for all ages, couples, family or even a self trip!

strIntroduction: First in the world – Water Bird! If you’re a non-swimmer, afraid of water, frightened to get your make-up smudged or any kind of similar reasons – Water Bird is your best option! strIntroduction: Tondaya, established in 1885, was the typical large-scale workshop during the Meiji Era (1868-1912). Five buildings in Tondaya was registered as National Cultural heritage in 1999 and also as Structure of Landscape Importance in Kyoto in 2007. Tondaya, which once was a Kimono large-scale wholesaler now also enlighten the education of traditional Kyoto lifestyle culture.
strTitle: Travel to Kyoto Tangible Cultural Property--- dressing in traditional Kimono and having a tea ceremony at historical Machiya.
Japanese Sweets Making
